src_original: tataḥ paścād uccatarake deśe caturdiśaṃ prekṣitavyam.  (Pravā-v 153)
Pravā-v J 5.1.3.1.  sacet pariśuddhāḥ samānadṛṣṭayo bhikṣava āgacchanti,  ta idaṃ syur vaktavyās. tvaritatvaritaṃ tāvad āyuṣmanta āgacchatādya saṃghasya pravāraṇā
sacet saṃpadyata ity evaṃ kuśalam. no cet saṃpadyate,
tena bhikṣuṇā svāsana āsadya cittam ity evam utpādayitavyaṃ vāg bhāṣitavyā. adya
